ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The truly good will be in perfect Bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The pious will surely be in heaven,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely the virtuous shall be in Bliss,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The virtuous ones will live in bliss
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the virtuous are in serenity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the Abrar (the righteous believers) will be in Delight;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely the righteous are in bliss,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely the pious shall be in bliss,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! the righteous verily will be in delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the virtuous will dwell in bliss,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the pious shall be in Delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the pious shall be amid bliss,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As for the Righteous, they will be in bliss;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Abrar (pious and righteous) will be in delight (Paradise);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, the righteous shall (live) in bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The virtuous will be in bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:13] Indeed the pious, the believers who are sincere in their faith, shall be amid bliss, [in] Paradise,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! the righteous) who are true in their faith: Abu Bakr and his believing brothers (verily will be in delight) in the Garden whose bliss is everlasting. 737
